Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 57th overall pick, by Capital City in 1982...
Injured on 5/26/1986 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...
Traded from Capital City to Bay City on 7/30/1987 (Going to CC: 1B T. Evans. Going to BC: 2B R. Guajardo, P D. Coachman)...
Injured on 8/11/1989 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Released by Bay City on 5/5/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 6/2/1990 to a minor league contract...
Injured on 7/19/1991 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Released by Boston (FBA) on 8/11/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 4/14/1992 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/27/1992 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
